title: launcher not opening
body: hi I have been trying to fix my league for 4 days now and nothing is helping I have tried uninstalling. I have tried to update stuff on my end as far as updates for my windows 7.  I have gone on to support groups n tried what they recommended but still nothing. I jus cant figure this out would someone please take the time to help me with this issue I cant wait to get back on the rift. Thank you

replies.body: Say um, what exactly is wrong with your League? You've given the jist of what you've done, but not the actual problem. What have you actually attempted thus far?
